price: 15. Mpe tosilaki kopesa Dâwud na Suleyman boyebi, mpe bango mibale balobaki: Matondo na Allah oyo apesi biso ebele o kati ya bawumbu naye bandimi.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا دَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيۡمَٰنَ عِلۡمٗاۖ وَقَالَا ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي فَضَّلَنَا عَلَىٰ كَثِيرٖ مِّنۡ عِبَادِهِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā dāwūda wasulaymāna ʿil'man waqālā al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī faḍḍalanā ʿalā kathīrin min ʿibādihi al-mu'minīna
